attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: When you first open this app, you see a picture of the orange man himself 🤢 I ALMOST PUKED. The picture was so disturbing I had to close the app. Y’all are 🤡🤡🤡 if you have this app

attributes.title: Do not get
attributes.review: This app took a month to download and I was not able to do anything on my phone. It also took up 10gb of space to download. DO NOT GET😡😡😡🤬🤬🤬🤬

attributes.title: this app 😭
attributes.review: ever since i got this app it completely ruined everything. my phone just randomly turns off and glitches out. i honestly don’t know the point of this app and it get me confused honestly. it would be better if there was a clearer purpose for this. but it keeps messing my phone up.

attributes.title: do NOT recommend
attributes.review: this app is terrible. it’s slow and it lags. and worst of all, there’s a very scary man’s all over the app 😔 please do not download u will be so traumatized. i’m scarred for life 💔

attributes.title: Glitches
attributes.review: God there were so many glitches! Whenever I tried to open the app it kicks me out!!!!😡😡😡 and it took FOREVER to download this stupid app!!!!😡😠🤬🤬🤬🤬😡🤬 1 STAR😤😤🤬🤬🤬🤬👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼

attributes.title: Great app
attributes.review: Donald trump is the absolute goat and he is gonna win in 2020

attributes.title: Horrible.
attributes.review: This app is just horrible. Terrible interface, user-unfriendly, crap content. Just a shameless self-serving self-promotion. A glorified ad and a waste of time. Will delete this.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!
attributes.review: do not get this app! it keeps glitching and is showing images of some pig... i had to get an entirely new phone because of a virus it brought! you have been warned.

attributes.title: Disappointed.
attributes.review: this is a true review from me. I am very disappointed this app doesn’t use hot spots and barely connects to wifi.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app is the worst app ever. I had to download it 5 times because it would not download 👁👄👁then my mom came in and yelled at me because the app killed my dog rip peppa🙏🏾😔🖤❤️
